description: Design • Improved storage features with new designs, minimizing tooling costs and time- to-market while providing flexibility for unique regional market demands: planned for the Chinese market and future premium models. • Researched the cargo space user experience and designed multiple easy-to- customize solutions for the future cross-over vehicle. • Enhanced Fisker’s auto show visitor experience by restructuring marketing content and redesigning CMF & sound experience installations, which also served as templates for future showroom displays in dealerships nationwide. Strategy • Structured Fisker’s sustainability strategy and milestones, and coordinated new partnerships with non-automotive suppliers which provide sustainable materials and/or processes. Branding • Translated the brand’s abstract philosophy into tangible design criteria for the Design and Marketing department. • Developed accessory design language guidelines by analyzing consumer lifestyles, materials, and graphic elements used in the luxury market. • Proposed the Bespoke (limited) edition strategy and themes, taking dealer installation capabilities and modification complexity into consideration.

description: Leads and directs daily operations activities for 140 technicians. Directly advises Director on all issues regarding the welfare, training, morale, and readiness. description: Leads and manages maintenance activities for 71 personnel. Sets policy, enforces standards, and provides technical assistance to 13,000+ customers and 383 functional and client support administrators. Oversees help desk operations and provides first line technical support 24 hours a day. Develops and provides customers with computer and software accountability training.
